trait.name: Siege Expert
entries: The excavator deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The excavator makes three Thunderous Warhammer attacks.

action.name: Thunderous Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) thunder damage.

bonus.name: Telekinetic Toss {@recharge 5}
entries: The excavator targets one Medium or smaller creature or an object weighing 300 pounds or less that isn't being worn or carried. The target, which must be within 30 feet of the excavator and visible to it, is magically pushed up to 20 feet horizontally in a direction of the excavator's choice. If the target is a creature, it can make a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw to resist the effect and is not pushed on a successful save.
